data.text: @rpcnz In fairness she may not be aware we live on a sparsely populated island in the middle of nowhere. I would suggest she worked harder to get her medical degree than Ardern has at anything.

@rpcnz Ffs what is wrong w these science types, why can’t they stay in their lane? I mean, siouxsie wiles should be taught at “science school” as an example of how NOT to be a public service academic commentator on scientific issues
@rpcnz Sorry that was a smoke screen

@rpcnz Like my piano teacher always said, it doesn't matter how you do, so long as you finish strong. 

This thing isn't over, and the end isn't looking that crash hot right now.

@rpcnz Many Kiwis are aware just how badly Labour manage anything. Covid "success" was down to geography and Labour were late, even then. Trump closed the border before we did. https://t.co/v5hQwqyDMB
@rpcnz 200k cases of Covid.  Yah, those Covid-0 policies really helped.  Are these commentators paid schills, bots, or just needing mental help?

@rpcnz She is just a labour shill. It is really sad. Ripped into Nat more than anything didn't mention anything with poor planning, raised Aussie ordering thousands of air purifiers for school but wouldn't attack Labour for not ordering them till too late. Just another hack
